description:
Mason is a fun guy to be around. With his witty humor and intelligence, there always seems to be something on his mind worth talking about.

Take, for example, this last shoot we did with him. To start things off, he comes rushing into the room like his favorite sitcom character (you'll have to see for yourself). After giving you the run down and how you'll most likely just fast forward to the end of his video to catch the cumshot, the blonde haired stud gives you a strip show before stroking his massive uncut cut to a creamy conclusion, dumping his man milk all over the bed.

We like Mason, and we're sure you do too!

Enjoy!
title: Bedroom Spanking
